author: Legal Department <legal@company.com>
subject: Confidential: Review of new NDA template
email_thread:
Dear Lance,

Our legal team has drafted a new Non-Disclosure Agreement template for use with external vendors. As a technical lead, we need your review of sections 4.2 and 5.1 (Intellectual Property and Confidential Information handling).

Please provide your feedback by end of day Thursday. This is a high-priority item.

Best regards,
Legal Department

• This is a legal/confidential document requiring human review

author: Security Team <security@company.com>
subject: URGENT: Unusual login activity detected
email_thread:
SECURITY ALERT

We've detected unusual login activity on your account:

- Location: Tokyo, Japan
- Time: 03:15 AM EST
- Device: Unknown Android device

If this was not you, please:
1. Change your password immediately
2. Enable 2-factor authentication
3. Contact security team

If this was you, please disregard this alert.

Do NOT reply to this automated message.
response_criteria:
• No response needed
• This is a critical security alert requiring immediate human attention

author: Product Manager <product@startup.com>
subject: Beta testing invitation for new AI tool
email_thread:
Hi Lance,

We're building an AI-powered code review tool and would love your expert feedback. Given your experience with ML systems, you'd be an ideal beta tester.

The beta program includes:
- Early access to the platform
- $500 AWS credits
- Direct access to our engineering team
- 6-month free subscription upon launch

Would you be interested in participating? The program starts next Monday.

Best,
Product Manager
response_criteria:
• Express interest in beta testing
• Ask about time commitment
• Send email with write_email tool call to express interest in AI code review tool beta testing
